Description of incident: Arcadia Home Care/Arcadia Health Services, Inc. notified employess of unauthorized access of their files by an independent contractor for Arcadia by the name of Charles E. Symes, II and his new business Alegre.  Mr. Symes was previously authorized to use Arcadia's database, which contained personal information, but only for authorized purposes and access. The company discovered Mr. Symes gaining unauthorized access to employee's personal information which included names, Social Security numbers, addresses, bank account information, California driver's license and other information. The company believes the information was breached on or around January 2014 through March 1, 2014.
